titles.title: Il mio ragazzo è un bastardo

credits.director:
Director:

Betty Thomas
credits.actor:
Stars:

Jesse Metcalfe

show.description: Directed by Betty Thomas. With Jesse Metcalfe, Ashanti, Arielle Kebbel, Sophia Bush. Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.
